entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with ice pellets late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm over southern sections. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
